app.title: Bluesky User Analytics
app.description: Analyze any Bluesky user's activity and engagement patterns

form.title: Enter Bluesky Handle
form.description: Enter a Bluesky username (e.g., username.bsky.social or username)

errors.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch data from Bluesky
errors.openaiError: Failed to get summary from AI assistant. The AI might be unavailable or an error occurred.

analysis.title: Activity Analysis
analysis.description: Analysis of user activity patterns and interactions
analysis.timeZoneNote: All times shown in your local timezone: {timezone}
analysis.wordCloudSubtitle: Most frequently used words in posts and replies

loading.pleaseWait: Please wait while we fetch and analyze the user's Bluesky activity...

openai.systemPrompt: You are an insightful social media analyst. Based on the user's latest 100 posts, provide a concise summary (around 100-150 words) of their personality, main topics of interest, and general tone. Highlight any recurring themes or notable characteristics. Be objective.
openai.noTextForSummary: Not enough text content from recent posts to generate an AI summary.
openai.disabledSummary: AI summary generation is currently disabled. User {username} has posted various content.

about.title: About Bluesky Analytics
about.subtitle: Understanding your social media presence on Bluesky
about.whatIsDescription: Bluesky Analytics is a free, open-source tool designed to help users understand their activity patterns and engagement on the Bluesky social network. We provide interactive visualizations and insights into your social media behavior.
about.activityVisualization: Activity Visualization: See your posting patterns over time
about.engagementMetrics: Engagement Metrics: Understand how your content performs
about.interactiveCharts: Interactive Charts: Explore your data with dynamic visualizations
about.privacyFirst: Privacy-First: Your data stays secure and private
about.howItWorksDescription: Simply enter any Bluesky handle to analyze public activity patterns. Our tool fetches publicly available data from the Bluesky API and presents it in an easy-to-understand format.
about.privacyDataDescription: We only access publicly available information from Bluesky profiles. No personal data is stored on our servers, and all analysis happens in real-time. For more details, see our
about.openSourceDescription: Bluesky Analytics is an open-source project. We believe in transparency and community-driven development. The source code is available for review and contributions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect your privacy and handle data
privacy.overviewDescription: Bluesky Analytics respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our service.
privacy.publicBlueskyDataDescription: We only access publicly available information from Bluesky profiles through their official API, including:
privacy.analyticsDataDescription: We use Vercel Analytics to understand how our website is used. This includes:
privacy.personalInfo: Personal identifying information beyond public profiles
privacy.howWeUseDataDescription: The data we access is used solely to:
privacy.improveService: Improve our service performance and user experience
privacy.ensureSecurity: Ensure the security and functionality of our platform
privacy.dataStorageDescription: We do not store user data on our servers. All analysis is performed in real-time, and results are not permanently stored. Our website is hosted on Vercel with industry-standard security measures.
privacy.thirdPartyServicesDescription: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.blueskyApi: Bluesky API: To fetch public profile data
privacy.yourRightsDescription: Since we only access public Bluesky data and don't store personal information, there's no personal data for us to modify or delete. However, you can:
privacy.controlProfile: Control what information is public on your Bluesky profile
privacy.contactUs: Contact us with any privacy concerns
privacy.stopUsing: Stop using our service at any time
privacy.childrensPrivacyDescription: Our service is not directed at children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.changesToPolicyDescription: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
privacy.contactUsDescription: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our practices, please contact us through our

help.title: Help & FAQ
help.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about Bluesky Analytics
help.howToAnalyze: How do I analyze a Bluesky profile?
help.howToAnalyzeAnswer: Simply enter any Bluesky handle (like @username.bsky.social) in the search box on our homepage. The analysis will begin automatically and show you activity patterns, engagement metrics, and interactive visualizations.
help.whatCanISeeAnswer: Our analytics show publicly available data including:
help.cantFindUser: Why can't I find a user?
help.cantFindUserAnswer: Make sure you're using the correct Bluesky handle format. It should include the full handle like @username.bsky.social. If the profile is private or doesn't exist, it won't appear in results.
help.incompleteData: The data looks incomplete or outdated
help.incompleteDataAnswer: We fetch data in real-time from the Bluesky API. If data appears incomplete, it might be due to:
help.apiLimits: API rate limits or temporary unavailability
help.recentChanges: Recent changes to the user's profile
help.tryRefreshing: Try refreshing the page or searching again after a few minutes.
help.javascriptDisabled: JavaScript being disabled in your browser
help.tryModernBrowser: Try using a modern browser with JavaScript enabled, or check your internet connection.
help.isDataSafeAnswer: Yes! We only access publicly available information and don't store any personal data on our servers. All analysis happens in real-time. See our
help.analyzePrivateAnswer: No, we can only analyze publicly available information. Private or protected profiles cannot be analyzed through our tool.
help.supportedBrowsersAnswer: Bluesky Analytics works best on modern browsers including:
help.apiAvailableAnswer: Currently, we don't offer a public API. All analytics are available through our web interface.
help.reportBug: How can I report a bug or request a feature?
help.reportBugAnswer: As an open-source project, we welcome bug reports and feature requests. You can contribute to the project or report issues through our code repository.
help.commercialUse: Can I use this for commercial purposes?
help.commercialUseAnswer: Bluesky Analytics is free to use for personal and commercial purposes. However, please respect Bluesky's terms of service and API rate limits.
help.stillNeedHelpAnswer: If you can't find the answer to your question here, please check our
help.forMoreInfo: for more information about how our service works.
